attributes.action: return to weekly bin collections during the summer months
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: From beginning of May to end of September to return to weekly bin collection to eliminate flys and maggots festering in food which is left to rot in bins.  if needs be to put council tax up to compensate for this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
